nodes.text: The Sombure sector was a sector located in the Mid Rim, neighboring the Irnaj, Iska, Oriolan, Wornal and Yushan sectors.

Sombure sector was controlled by Moff Utoxx Prentioch. After the substantial defeat of the Galactic Empire at the Battle of Endor, Prentioch seized control of the sector's military forces and began forming his own empire.
